Class EventStoreHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.storage.EventStoreHelper

  • public class EventStoreHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Helper class for building and maintaining the SQLite Database used by the Tracker.
